page.title: 18GARDEN TRAILS IN CHALFORD
page.content: Every summer there is a Garden Trail in Chalford.People who do not mind other people looking in their garden have a sign on their gate saying "Open Garden".Everyone pays one pound and is given a leaflet showing all the gardens that are open to the public. You can then walk round the village looking at the gardens.We enjoy looking at all the flowers in everyone's gardens.If it is sunny there are ice-creams for sale.As Chalford is built on a steep slope you get wonderful views from all the cottage gardens.You can look over the rooftops at the houses and gardens below in the valley.The money raised is for the Chalford Village Hall project,as we are trying to build a hall for the people of the village to use for recreation.
